script.model_description: Nam chau A, da trang, mat den, toc den, 25 tuoi

hook.dialogue: Ban co biet tai sao nhung nguoi thanh cong luon deo tai nghe cao cap khong?
hook.visual: Close-up tai nghe tren tai nguoi mau nam chau A

introduction.dialogue: Hom nay toi se review tai nghe Model X1 - san pham dang lam mua lam gio tren thi truong!
introduction.visual: Nguoi mau cam tai nghe, gioi thieu san pham

features.dialogue: Diem noi bat: am thanh cuc ky trong treo voi cong nghe noise cancelling tien tien
features.visual: Nguoi mau deo tai nghe, bieu cam hai long

design.dialogue: Thiet ke sang trong, deo ca ngay khong moi tai, pin 30 gio su dung lien tuc
design.visual: Close-up thiet ke tai nghe, nguoi mau trong tu the thoai mai

connectivity.dialogue: Ket noi Bluetooth 5.0 sieu nhanh, tuong thich moi thiet bi, gia chi 2.5 trieu
connectivity.visual: Nguoi mau ket noi voi dien thoai, su dung tai nghe

call_to_action.dialogue: Dat hang ngay hom nay de duoc giam 20% va tang kem case bao ve cao cap!
call_to_action.visual: Nguoi mau chi tay ve phia camera, hien thi link mua hang
